alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:09PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jo Daviess and central Dubuque Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 408 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Balltown, or 12 miles southeast of Guttenberg, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Balltown around 415 PM CDT. Rickardsville around 420 PM CDT. Sherrill around 425 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Dubuque, Durango, Asbury, Centralia, Sageville, East Dubuque and Menominee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
